MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 30-NOV-2020 14:54.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Newmarket Gardens, Booth Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:54AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.09PM on 30th November 2020
